lines.text: Well, a gun firing has a muzzle flash, right?
...Not really how it works. The point of a gun is to contain the propulsive explosion.
Well, ordinarily I'd say it was possible- if it hit a hard enough surface, the fragmentation could cause ignition.
But... it seems the bullet was caught by- by the, uh. Victim. The Go Wizard.
Right. We didn't find the bullet anywhere in the room, so it's probably still in the guy.
